content: Okay - that's cool... One time, our Scout Platoon in Germany decided to paint all our CVC Tanker Helmets blood red!! Nixon had ordered all the Ammo off our vehicles, so we decided we were dead ducks in a fight anyway - why not be arrogant about it!! They looked really cool too - But the Brigade Commander was not impressed... They were OD again by that afternoon!! Wandering and Wondering
